articles.description: With the biggest waitlist in Boots history, No.7's first ever retinol serum is breaking the internet. But is it worth the wait?
articles.content:
A smart advancement 
For many years, retinol was delivered to the skin in quite a crude way, with products giving the skin a slug of it very quickly, causing immediate irritation. More recently, tec… [+3843 chars]
